articles.title: Thala Ajith fans get a Valimai update, first song Naanga Vera Maari out today - India Today
articles.description: Thala Ajith’s first song titled Naanga Vera Maari from Valimai, will release at 10:45 pm today (August 2). Directed by H Vinoth, the film stars Ajith in the lead role.
